sentences.en: " Everybody will grant that, Edward -- grant it privately, anyway.
sentences.cn: " 谁都会这么说, 爱德华 -- 不管当众怎么样, 背后谁都会这么说.

sentences.en: "Perhaps we can talk somewhere privately," said Kesler.
sentences.cn: “也许我们可以找个地方私下谈谈，”凯斯勒说道。

sentences.en: At ten Harkness had a talk with him privately.
sentences.cn: 十点钟,哈克尼斯和他私下交谈了一会.

sentences.en: He had privately resolved he would buy her the dress.
sentences.cn: 他暗地里下定决心要给她买那件衣服。

sentences.en: He pretends to admire me, though privately he hates me.
sentences.cn: 他假装敬佩我, 虽然他私下仇恨我.

sentences.en: I must talk to you privately.
I spoke privately to the candidate after the oral.
sentences.cn: 口试后，我私下里与那位考生谈了谈。

sentences.en: Most local radio stations are privately-owned.
sentences.cn: 大多数地方电台为私人所有。

sentences.en: Privately they seem to have the same exacting standards.
sentences.cn: 私下里，他们似乎都有同样苛刻的标准。

sentences.en: Privately, she worries about whether she's really good enough.
sentences.cn: 她暗自担心自己是不是真的有那么好。

sentences.en: She was privately educated at schools in Ireland and Paris.
sentences.cn: 她在爱尔兰和巴黎的学校接受过私立教育。

sentences.en: Some ministers admit privately that unemployment could continue to rise.
sentences.cn: 一些部长私下承认失业率可能继续升高.

sentences.en: The man privately admits that his motive is profits.
sentences.cn: 那人私下承认他的动机是为了牟利.

sentences.en: The whole process makes buying a car privately as painless as buying from a garage.
sentences.cn: 整个过程使得从私人手中购买汽车与从汽车库购买一样方便。

sentences.en: Together they travel the world, sourcing clothes for the small, privately owned company.
sentences.cn: 他们一道走遍世界各地，为那家私营小公司寻觅服装货源。

sentences.en: Two out of five thought the business would be sold privately on their retirement or death.
sentences.cn: 五个人之中有两个认为公司会在他们退休或去世时被私下卖掉。

words.tran_cn: 私人的；不公开的；秘密参与的
私掠船；武装民船；私掠船船长；私掠船船员

trans.tran_cn: 私下地，不公开地，私自，背地里
